Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Mark Barnhart, David Skinner, and James Pappas to take the competitive civil service examination and be placed on the eligible civil service list for employment with the village of Wayland
Summary: Authorizes Mark Barnhart, David Skinner, and James Pappas to take the competitive civil service examination and be placed on the eligible civil service list for employment as full-time police officers with the village of Wayland.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Mark Barnhart, David Skinner, and James Pappas to take the competitive civil service examination and be placed on the eligible civil service list for employment as a full-time police officer for the Wayland police department
